lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki had 15 points and 10 rebounds to lead Germany over Italy, 67-58, and into the quarterfinals of the European championships in Madrid.Marco Belinelli, who limped off with an ankle injury midway through the second period but returned to play, led Italy with 25 points. Toronto Raptors centre Andrea Bargnani added 10.Germany will face world champion Spain in the quarterfinals today. Ramunas Siskauskas scored 21 points to help Lithuania beat Slovenia, 80-61.
